Summary: Bright star-like flashing red, yellow, white and blue.
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There were no other sightings in Santa Clarita on or around November 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to bed when I noticed I could see so many stars it must have been very clear skies that night. The stars were very bright and off to the southeast I see this one exceptionally bright star. As I watch it begins flashing these different colors almost in sequence. Blue, yellow, red then back to star-like white. I watched for 15 or 20 mins and all of a sudden it's gone. It never moved or at least I never saw it move to my knowledge.
